dct_description_sm: Topographical map indicating Prieska and other towns and villages, roads, railways, rivers, mountains and other features in the area surrounding Prieska.
Relief shown by contours, form lines and spot heights.
Map folds into an outer cover.

6 ancillary maps (scale 1 in. to 0.5 miles): Kliphuis Drift -- Naauwgekneld Drift -- Buis Vlei Drift -- Nouga Drift -- Prieska Drift -- Muishoek Drift ; 2 ancillary maps (scale 1 in. to 1 mile): Marydale -- Prieska.
Mounted on cloth. Slightly torn along folds.
Descriptive text on nature of country, roads, drifts, transport, water, fuel, grazing and Prieska.
